name: Asian Tacos
ingredients: 1 can of chili-flavored oat sour cream
1 package of ginger-flavored pulled oats or minced meat
steps: Mix hoisin sauce, sesame oil, sesame seeds, and lemon juice to make the sauce.
Heat the veggie protein according to the instructions in a pan (or microwave).
Spread sour cream on the tortilla and layer the other toppings on top.
